title: Party Girl, Inc.
description: Want to party hardy? Ebony Harris is the owner of Party Girl, Incorporated. She makes a living planning parties. Ebony takes her job very seriously, no matter how much her assistant and best friend Jenna tries to get her to lighten up. Ebony is all business...until she meets Brock Huntington. Brock thinks he's going to another boring wedding reception, but finds himself drawn to Ebony. He soon discovers that she's unlike any woman he's ever met. Suddenly, Ebony's personal life clashes with her professional life. Can Brock convince her to finally put pleasure before business?
author: Destiny Wallace
